name: Apple's Adventure!
description:
Apple's Adventure is an Adventure game made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5.

a short and sweet game that takes about 5 to 10 minutes to finish.

Stop the Inklings from Destroying the World!

-----------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

WASD to move.

LMB to shoot.

Space to jump.

Esc to Close the game.

F11 to make the game fullscreen.

F9 to make the game windowed.

P to Pause.

-----------------------------------------------------

HOPE YOU ENJOY!!!
